scripts.release:patch: cd api && npm run release:patch && cd .. && npm version --no-git-tag-version --force patch
scripts.release:minor: cd api && npm run release:minor && cd .. && npm version --no-git-tag-version --force minor
scripts.release:major: cd api && npm run release:major && cd .. && npm version --no-git-tag-version --force major
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator -u kalisio -p kapp && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.provision: npm run icons:cp && npm run tours:cp
scripts.dev: npm run provision && cross-env NODE_ENV=development quasar dev
scripts.cordova:dev:android: envsub -s dollar-both src-cordova/config.xml.tpl src-cordova/config.xml && npm run provision && quasar dev -m android
scripts.cordova:dev:ios: envsub -s dollar-both src-cordova/config.xml.tpl src-cordova/config.xml && npm run provision && quasar dev -m ios
scripts.cordova:build:android: envsub -s dollar-both src-cordova/config.xml.tpl src-cordova/config.xml && npm run provision && quasar build -m cordova -T android
scripts.cordova:build:ios: envsub -s dollar-both src-cordova/config.xml.tpl src-cordova/config.xml && npm run provision && quasar build -m cordova -T ios -- --device
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:stats && npm run analyze:treemap
scripts.cafe:firefox: npm run cafe:cp && testcafe firefox test/*.test.js
scripts.cafe:chrome: npm run cafe:cp && testcafe chrome test/*.test.js
scripts.cafe:dev:firefox: npm run cafe:cp && cross-env APP_URL=https://kapp.dev.kalisio.xyz testcafe firefox test/*.test.js
scripts.cafe:dev:chrome: npm run cafe:cp && cross-env APP_URL=https://kapp.dev.kalisio.xyz testcafe chrome test/*.test.js
scripts.test:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=production testcafe chrome:headless test/*.test.js --app "npm run prod" --app-init-delay 10000 -S -s screenshots
